==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=丝竹}}

===Etymology===
[[絲]] ("[[silk]]," referring to string instruments, which formerly had strings made of twisted silk) + [[竹]] ("[[bamboo]]," referring to woodwind instruments, which were typically made of bamboo).

===Pronunciation===

|c=si1 zuk1
|w=1sr tsoq
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[music]]
# traditional stringed and woodwind instruments
